name: Create Customerly leads from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new person is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add that person to Customerly as a deal. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1HBBmkHFzcUL1DmZ1hrv2ewZS_IqyIMmkxZnO9mNsVMk/edit?usp=sharing).
